ground_truth: The low wide shot crops the BIKER at his shins, with the gas station in the background behind him. The Biker pauses for a moment, thinking or feeling. CRASH - the bathroom door flies open as the Biker bursts in astride his hog, bright daylight streaming in with him to throw him into imposing silhouette. Shafts of light pouring in are defined by motes of dust dancing in the air. A fast track in on the jar of hair jelly sitting on the shelf under the mirror is shown, followed by an extreme close shot of his nostrils dilating as we hear him sniff. They are both intently munching cornflakes, staring at something offscreen. Ed is sitting in the living room, bottle-feeding Nathan Jr., surrounded by the rumpled sheets and blankets used by the house guests. Gale puts his spoon down and picks up a cigarette which has been smoking in the ashtray next to him, with a bead of milk dribbling down his chin. He takes a contemplative puff, studying Ed through a mouthful of cornflakes. Gale blows out smoke and picks up his spoon to start back in on his cornflakes. Hi is walking in, yawning, holding the cornflakes box arrested in mid-air, looking at Ed, who is motioning to Gale and Evelle with her eyes. Gale and Evelle are looking dumbly from Ed to Hi, more relaxed now, to Ed, looking pleadingly at Hi. Feeling the look, he goes back to his cornflakes. Gale leans back to blow smoke at the ceiling. Hi, with Ed standing by, is just opening the door to a young couple. Glen is a short, stocky blond man in his early thirties, wearing Bermuda shorts, while DOT is wearing slacks, heels, and a scarf over her hair. From behind, Glen gives her an energetic THWOK on the ass. Dot spins and smacks Glen across the face with her purse through clenched teeth, and he reels under the blow. Dot shrieks again, but this time muffles it with her own hand, tiptoeing into the trailer, hand to her mouth. Glen, rubbing his cheek, seems angry at himself. At the top of the stoop, Glen turns out to the yard, where a scad of children, ranging in age from two to seven, are crawling over Hi's car. One is beating on it with a large stick, another sits on the hood pulling back one of the windshield wipers, etc. As Ed and Dot enter, Ed beams as they go to the crib. Dot puts her hand to her forehead, reacting to the baby as if she is about to faint, hides her face in her hands and looks away as if blinded, then sneaks a look around her hands.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: The minimal broad capture trims the MOTORCYCLIST at his shins, with the fuel depot in the backdrop behind him. The Motorcyclist pauses for a moment, pondering or sensing. CRASH - the restroom door flies open as the Motorcyclist erupts in astride his motorcycle, radiant daylight streaming in with him to cast him into intimidating outline. Beams of light pouring in are defined by specks of dust dancing in the air. A swift track in on the jar of hair gel sitting on the shelf beneath the mirror is shown, followed by an extreme close shot of his nostrils expanding as we hear him sniff. They are both intently crunching cornflakes, staring at something offscreen. Ed is sitting in the parlor, bottle-feeding Nathan Jr., surrounded by the wrinkled sheets and blankets used by the house visitors. Gale puts his spoon down and picks up a cigarette which has been burning in the ashtray next to him, with a bead of milk trickling down his chin. He takes a reflective puff, observing Ed through a mouthful of cornflakes. Gale exhales smoke and picks up his spoon to start back in on his cornflakes. Hi is walking in, yawning, holding the cornflakes box suspended in mid-air, looking at Ed, who is signaling to Gale and Evelle with her eyes. Gale and Evelle are looking dumbly from Ed to Hi, more relaxed now, to Ed, looking imploringly at Hi. Feeling the look, he goes back to his cornflakes. Gale reclines back to blow smoke at the ceiling. Hi, with Ed standing by, is just opening the door to a young pair. Glen is a short, stocky blond man in his early thirties, wearing Bermuda shorts, while DOT is wearing trousers, heels, and a scarf over her hair. From behind, Glen gives her an energetic THWOK on the ass. Dot spins and smacks Glen across the face with her handbag through clenched teeth, and he reels under the blow. Dot shrieks again, but this time muffles it with her own hand, tiptoeing into the trailer, hand to her mouth. Glen, rubbing his cheek, seems angry at himself. At the top of the stoop, Glen turns out to the yard, where a multitude of children, ranging in age from two to seven, are crawling over Hi's car. One is hitting on it with a large stick, another sits on the hood pulling back one of the windshield wipers, etc. As Ed and Dot enter, Ed beams as they go to the crib. Dot puts her hand to her forehead, reacting to the baby as if she is about to faint, hides her face in her hands and looks away as if blinded, then sneaks a peek around her hands.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: The BIKER is cropped at his shins by the low wide shot, with the gas station in the background behind him. A pause is made by the Biker for a moment, with him thinking or feeling. CRASH - the bathroom door is flown open as his hog is burst in astride by the Biker, bright daylight is streamed in with him to throw him into an imposing silhouette. Motes of dust define shafts of light pouring in while they dance in the air. We are shown a fast track in on the jar of hair jelly sitting on the shelf under the mirror, followed by his nostrils dilating in an extreme close shot as sniffing is heard from him. Cornflakes are being intently munched by them, staring at something offscreen. Ed sits in the living room, while Nathan Jr. is bottle-fed by her, surrounded by the rumpled sheets and blankets the house guests used. A cigarette, which has been smoking in the ashtray next to him, is picked up by Gale after he puts his spoon down, with milk dribbling down his chin. A contemplative puff is taken by him, studying Ed through a mouthful of cornflakes. Smoke is blown out by Gale, and his spoon is picked up to start back in on his cornflakes. Hi walks in, yawning, holding the cornflakes box arrested in mid-air, looking at Ed, who motions to Gale and Evelle with her eyes. Dumb looks go from Ed to Hi, more relaxed now, to Ed, looking pleadingly at Hi from Gale and Evelle. Feeling the look, he goes back to his cornflakes. Smoke is blown at the ceiling by Gale as he leans back. The door is just opened by Hi, with Ed standing by, to a young couple. Glen is a short, stocky blond man in his early thirties, and Bermuda shorts are worn by him, while DOT wears slacks, heels, and a scarf over her hair. An energetic THWOK on the ass is given to her by Glen from behind. Dot spins and smacks Glen across the face with her purse through clenched teeth, and under the blow, he reels. A shriek is given by Dot again, but this time it is muffled with her own hand, as tiptoeing into the trailer is done by her, hand to her mouth. Glen, rubbing his cheek, seems angry at himself. At the top of the stoop, a turn is made by Glen out to the yard, where a scad of children, ranging in age from two to seven, crawl over Hi's car. One beats on it with a large stick, another sits on the hood pulling back one of the windshield wipers, etc. As they enter, a beam is made by Ed as he and Dot go to the crib. Her hand is put to her forehead by Dot, reacting to the baby as if fainting is about to happen to her, her face is hidden in her hands and she looks away as if blindness has occurred, then around her hands, a sneak peek is taken by her.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: The low wide shot frames the BIKER at his shins, with the gas station behind him. He pauses, contemplating. CRASH - the bathroom door bursts open as the Biker rides in, daylight casting him in silhouette. Light shafts reveal dust motes in the air. A fast track shows a jar of hair jelly on the shelf, followed by a close-up of his nostrils as he sniffs. Ed bottle-feeds Nathan Jr. in the living room, surrounded by rumpled sheets. Gale puts down his spoon, picks up a cigarette, and studies Ed while eating cornflakes. He blows smoke, resumes eating. Hi enters, yawning, holding the cornflakes box, looking at Ed, who signals Gale and Evelle with her eyes. They look from Ed to Hi, then back to their cornflakes. Gale leans back, blowing smoke at the ceiling. Hi and Ed open the door to a young couple. Glen, a short blond man in his thirties, wears Bermuda shorts; DOT wears slacks, heels, and a scarf. Glen gives her a THWOK on the ass; Dot spins and smacks him with her purse. Dot muffles a shriek, tiptoeing into the trailer. Glen, rubbing his cheek, seems self-reproachful. Outside, children aged two to seven crawl over Hi's car, one beating it with a stick, another pulling a windshield wiper. Ed and Dot enter, Ed beams at the crib. Dot reacts dramatically to the baby, hiding her face, then peeking through her hands.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: The low wide shot shows the Biker's shins with a gas station behind. He pauses, then crashes through the bathroom door on his bike, silhouetted by daylight and dust. A fast track reveals a jar of hair jelly, followed by a close-up of his sniffing nostrils. Ed bottle-feeds Nathan Jr. in a rumpled living room. Gale, eating cornflakes, smokes contemplatively, watching Ed. Hi enters, yawning, holding cornflakes, as Ed signals Gale and Evelle. They look between Ed and Hi, who returns to his cornflakes. Gale blows smoke at the ceiling. Hi and Ed open the door to Glen, a stocky blond in Bermuda shorts, and Dot in slacks and a scarf. Glen smacks Dot, who retaliates with her purse. Dot muffles a shriek, tiptoeing inside. Glen, rubbing his cheek, looks angry. Outside, children play on Hi's car. Ed and Dot enter, and Ed beams at the crib. Dot reacts dramatically to the baby, hiding her face, then peeking through her hands.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: The low, wide shot captures the BIKER from the shins down, with the gas station prominently visible in the background behind him. The Biker pauses momentarily, lost in thought or perhaps overwhelmed by a feeling. Suddenly, there is a loud CRASH as the bathroom door flies open, and the Biker dramatically bursts in astride his powerful hog. Bright daylight streams in with him, casting him into an imposing silhouette. Shafts of light pour in, defined by motes of dust that dance gracefully in the air. The camera quickly tracks in on a jar of hair jelly sitting on the shelf beneath the mirror, followed by an extreme close-up shot of his nostrils flaring as we hear him sniff. Meanwhile, they are both intently munching on cornflakes, their eyes fixed on something offscreen. Ed is comfortably seated in the living room, bottle-feeding Nathan Jr., surrounded by the rumpled sheets and blankets left by the house guests. Gale places his spoon down and picks up a cigarette that has been smoldering in the ashtray beside him, a bead of milk dribbling down his chin. He takes a contemplative puff, studying Ed through a mouthful of cornflakes. Gale exhales a cloud of smoke and picks up his spoon to resume eating his cornflakes. Hi walks in, yawning, holding the cornflakes box suspended in mid-air, looking at Ed, who is motioning to Gale and Evelle with her eyes. Gale and Evelle look dumbly from Ed to Hi, now more relaxed, then back to Ed, who looks pleadingly at Hi. Feeling the weight of her gaze, he returns to his cornflakes. Gale leans back, blowing smoke toward the ceiling. Hi, with Ed standing by, is just opening the door to welcome a young couple. Glen is a short, stocky blond man in his early thirties, dressed in Bermuda shorts, while DOT is wearing slacks, heels, and a scarf elegantly draped over her hair. From behind, Glen gives her an energetic THWOK on the backside. Dot spins around and smacks Glen across the face with her purse, her teeth clenched, and he reels from the blow. Dot shrieks again, but this time she muffles it with her own hand, tiptoeing into the trailer, her hand covering her mouth. Glen, rubbing his cheek, appears angry with himself. At the top of the stoop, Glen turns to face the yard, where a scad of children, ranging in age from two to seven, are crawling all over Hi's car. One child is beating on it with a large stick, while another sits on the hood, pulling back one of the windshield wipers, and so on. As Ed and Dot enter, Ed beams with pride as they approach the crib. Dot places her hand to her forehead, reacting to the baby as if she is about to faint, then hides her face in her hands and looks away as if blinded, before sneaking a peek around her fingers.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: The low, wide-angle shot expertly captures the BIKER from the shins downward, with the gas station prominently visible as a distinct backdrop behind him. The Biker stands still for a moment, caught in contemplation or perhaps overwhelmed by an intense feeling. All of a sudden, there is a loud CRASH as the bathroom door swings open violently, and the Biker bursts in dramatically while astride his powerful hog. Bright, blinding daylight streams in alongside him, casting him into an imposing silhouette that dominates the scene. Shafts of vivid light pour in, highlighted by dancing motes of dust that swirl gracefully in the air around him. The camera swiftly tracks in on a jar of hair jelly sitting quietly on the shelf beneath the mirror, followed by an extremely close-up shot of his nostrils flaring as the sound of him sniffing is heard. Meanwhile, they are both intensely munching on cornflakes, their eyes fixated on something offscreen. Comfortably seated in the living room, Ed is bottle-feeding Nathan Jr., surrounded by the rumpled sheets and blankets left behind by house guests. Gale places his spoon down quietly and picks up a cigarette that has been smoldering in the ashtray beside him, with a bead of milk dribbling down his chin. He takes a contemplative puff of the cigarette, studying Ed through a mouthful of crunchy cornflakes. After a moment, Gale exhales a cloud of smoke and picks up his spoon again to resume eating his cornflakes. Hi enters the room yawning, holding the cornflakes box suspended mid-air, looking at Ed, who is motioning with her eyes to both Gale and Evelle. Gale and Evelle look dumbly from Ed to Hi, now appearing more relaxed, then back to Ed, who gazes pleadingly at Hi. Feeling the weight of her gaze upon him, he returns to focus on his cornflakes. Gale leans back, nonchalantly blowing smoke up toward the ceiling. Hi, with Ed standing by his side, is just in the process of opening the door to warmly welcome a young couple. Glen is a short, stocky blond man, likely in his early thirties, clad in Bermuda shorts, while DOT is elegantly dressed in slacks, high heels, with a scarf draped over her hair. From behind, Glen gives her an energetic THWOK on the backside. Dot spins around abruptly and smacks Glen across the face with her purse, her teeth clenched in frustration, and he reels backward in response to the blow. Dot shrieks again, but this time she muffles it with her own hand, quietly tiptoeing into the trailer, her hand covering her mouth. Glen, rubbing his cheek thoughtfully, appears visibly angry with himself. At the top of the stoop, Glen turns to face the yard, where a scad of rambunctious children, whose ages range from two to seven, are crawling all over Hi's car. One child is enthusiastically beating on it with a large stick, while another perches casually on the hood, pulling back one of the windshield wipers, and so forth. As Ed and Dot step inside, Ed beams proudly as they approach the crib. Dot places her hand to her forehead, reacting dramatically to the sight of the baby as if she is about to faint, then she hides her face in her hands and looks away as if blinded, before sneaking a peek around her fingers to catch another glimpse.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: The scene opens with a low wide shot that captures the Biker only from the shins down, with the gas station serving as a backdrop behind him. He stands still for a brief moment, seemingly lost in thought or emotion. Suddenly, a loud crash echoes as the bathroom door violently swings open, and the Biker dramatically enters astride his motorcycle. Bright daylight floods in with him, casting his figure into a striking silhouette. The beams of light are accentuated by tiny dust particles that dance in the air. The camera swiftly zooms in on a jar of hair jelly resting on a shelf beneath a mirror, followed by an extreme close-up of the Biker's nostrils flaring as he takes a deep sniff. Meanwhile, Ed and another person are intensely munching on cornflakes, their eyes fixed on something offscreen. In the living room, Ed is seated, bottle-feeding Nathan Jr., surrounded by the disheveled sheets and blankets left by house guests. Gale, sitting nearby, places his spoon down and picks up a cigarette that has been smoldering in the ashtray beside him, a bead of milk trickling down his chin. He takes a thoughtful drag, observing Ed while chewing on cornflakes. After exhaling a cloud of smoke, Gale resumes eating his cornflakes. Hi enters the room, yawning, with a box of cornflakes suspended in mid-air, his gaze fixed on Ed, who is subtly signaling to Gale and Evelle with her eyes. Gale and Evelle, appearing more at ease, glance back and forth between Ed and Hi, with Ed giving Hi a pleading look. Sensing the silent communication, Hi returns his attention to his cornflakes. Gale leans back, exhaling smoke towards the ceiling. Hi, with Ed by his side, opens the door to greet a young couple. Glen, a short, stocky blond man in his early thirties, is dressed in Bermuda shorts, while Dot is clad in slacks, heels, and a scarf covering her hair. From behind, Glen playfully delivers a spirited thwack to Dot's backside. In response, Dot spins around and smacks Glen across the face with her purse, her teeth clenched in anger, causing him to stagger from the impact. Dot lets out another shriek, but quickly stifles it with her hand, tiptoeing into the trailer with her hand covering her mouth. Glen, rubbing his cheek, appears frustrated with himself. At the top of the stoop, Glen turns to face the yard, where a group of children, aged two to seven, are clambering over Hi's car. One child is energetically beating the car with a large stick, while another is perched on the hood, tugging at a windshield wiper. As Ed and Dot step inside, Ed smiles warmly as they approach the crib. Dot places her hand on her forehead, reacting to the sight of the baby as if she might faint, then hides her face in her hands, peeking through her fingers as if overwhelmed by the sight.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: The low wide shot captures the Biker's shins with the gas station in the background. He pauses momentarily before dramatically bursting into the bathroom on his motorcycle, silhouetted by the bright daylight streaming in, highlighting dust motes in the air. The camera quickly focuses on a jar of hair jelly on the shelf, followed by an extreme close-up of the Biker's nostrils as he sniffs. Meanwhile, Ed is in the living room, bottle-feeding Nathan Jr. amidst the rumpled bedding of house guests. Gale, with milk dribbling down his chin, puts down his spoon, picks up a cigarette, and studies Ed while puffing contemplatively. He resumes eating cornflakes as Hi enters, yawning and holding a cornflakes box, while Ed signals to Gale and Evelle with her eyes. They exchange looks, more relaxed now, and return to their cornflakes. Gale leans back, blowing smoke at the ceiling. Hi, with Ed beside him, opens the door to a young couple, Glen and Dot. Glen, a short, stocky blond man in his early thirties, wears Bermuda shorts, while Dot is in slacks, heels, and a scarf. Glen playfully smacks Dot, who retaliates by hitting him with her purse, causing him to reel. Dot muffles a shriek with her hand and tiptoes into the trailer, while Glen, rubbing his cheek, appears self-reproachful. On the stoop, Glen observes a group of children, aged two to seven, climbing over Hi's car, with one beating it with a stick and another pulling a windshield wiper. As Ed and Dot enter, Ed beams at the crib, while Dot reacts dramatically to the baby, feigning faintness, hiding her face, and then peeking through her fingers.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: The low wide shot crops the BIKER at his shins, with the gas station in the background behind him, one of those ubiquitous roadside stops that sprang up during the automobile boom of the mid-20th century. The Biker pauses for a moment, thinking or feeling. CRASH - the bathroom door flies open as the Biker bursts in astride his hog, a colloquial term for his powerful Harley-Davidson motorcycle, bright daylight streaming in with him to throw him into imposing silhouette. Shafts of light pouring in are defined by motes of dust dancing in the air, reminiscent of the way light can highlight the invisible particles floating in old dusty places. A fast track in on the jar of hair jelly, a styling product popular in the 1950s for its slick finish, sitting on the shelf under the mirror is shown, followed by an extreme close shot of his nostrils dilating as we hear him sniff. They are both intently munching cornflakes, the classic American breakfast cereal first introduced in the early 1900s, staring at something offscreen. Ed is sitting in the living room, bottle-feeding Nathan Jr., surrounded by the rumpled sheets and blankets used by the house guests, evidence of a chaotic night prior. Gale puts his spoon down and picks up a cigarette, a habit that became increasingly criticized in the late 20th century due to its health risks, which has been smoking in the ashtray next to him, with a bead of milk dribbling down his chin. He takes a contemplative puff, studying Ed through a mouthful of cornflakes. Gale blows out smoke and picks up his spoon to start back in on his cornflakes. Hi is walking in, yawning, holding the cornflakes box arrested in mid-air, looking at Ed, who is motioning to Gale and Evelle with her eyes, a silent communication often used among people familiar with each other's body language. Gale and Evelle are looking dumbly from Ed to Hi, more relaxed now, to Ed, looking pleadingly at Hi. Feeling the look, he goes back to his cornflakes. Gale leans back to blow smoke at the ceiling, where the paint has yellowed from years of similar habits. Hi, with Ed standing by, is just opening the door to a young couple. Glen is a short, stocky blond man in his early thirties, wearing Bermuda shorts, a style originating from the British Army's tropical uniforms, while DOT is wearing slacks, heels, and a scarf over her hair, reminiscent of 1950s film stars. From behind, Glen gives her an energetic THWOK on the ass. Dot spins and smacks Glen across the face with her purse through clenched teeth, and he reels under the blow. Dot shrieks again, but this time muffles it with her own hand, tiptoeing into the trailer, hand to her mouth, as if trying not to wake a sleeping baby. Glen, rubbing his cheek, seems angry at himself, perhaps aware of the impropriety of his actions. At the top of the stoop, Glen turns out to the yard, where a scad of children, ranging in age from two to seven, are crawling over Hi's car, a testament to the chaotic energy children often bring. One is beating on it with a large stick, another sits on the hood pulling back one of the windshield wipers, etc. As Ed and Dot enter, Ed beams as they go to the crib. Dot puts her hand to her forehead, reacting to the baby as if she is about to faint, takes a moment to compose herself as she's overwhelmed by emotion, hides her face in her hands and looks away as if blinded, then sneaks a look around her hands.

In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. Feeling the look he goes back to his cornflakes. Gale leans back to blow smoke at the ceiling. Hi with Ed standing by is just opening the door to a young couple. Glen is a short stocky blond man in his early thirties wearing Bermuda shorts while DOT is wearing slacks heels and a scarf over her hair. From behind Glen gives her an energetic THWOK on the ass. Dot spins and smacks Glen across the face with her purse through clenched teeth and he reels under the blow. Dot shrieks again but this time muffles it with her own hand tiptoeing into the trailer hand to her mouth. Glen rubbing his cheek seems angry at himself. At the top of the stoop Glen turns out to the yard where a scad of children ranging in age from two to seven are crawling over Hi's car. One is beating on it with a large stick another sits on the hood pulling back one of the windshield wipers etc. As Ed and Dot enter Ed beams as they go to the crib. Dot puts her hand to her forehead reacting to the baby as if she is about to faint hides her face in her hands. and looks away as if blinded then sneaks a look around her hands.

Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. Feeling the look he goes back to his cornflakes. Gale leans back to blow smoke at the ceiling. Hi with Ed standing by is just opening the door to a young couple. Glen is a short stocky blond man in his early thirties wearing Bermuda shorts while DOT is wearing slacks heels and a scarf over her hair. From behind Glen gives her an energetic THWOK on the ass. Dot spins and smacks Glen across the face with her purse through clenched teeth and he reels under the blow. Dot shrieks again but this time muffles it with her own hand tiptoeing into the trailer hand to her mouth. Glen rubbing his cheek seems angry at himself. At the top of the stoop Glen turns out to the yard where a scad of children ranging in age from two to seven are crawling over Hi's car. One is beating on it with a large stick another sits on the hood pulling back one of the windshield wipers etc. As Ed and Dot enter Ed beams as they go to the crib. Dot puts her hand to her forehead reacting to the baby as if she is about to faint hides her face in her hands. and looks away as if blinded then sneaks a look around her hands.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~50%)
test_cases.description: The low wide shot crops the BIKER at his shins with the gas station in the background behind him. The Biker pauses for a moment thinking or feeling CRASH. the bathroom door flies open as the Biker bursts in astride his hog. bright daylight streaming in with him to throw him into imposing silhouette. Shafts of light pouring in are defined by motes of dust dancing in the air. A fast track in on the jar of hair jelly sitting on the shelf under the mirror is shown followed by an extreme close shot of his nostrils dilating as we hear him sniff. They are both intently munching cornflakes staring at something offscreen. Glen rubbing his cheek seems angry at himself. At the top of the stoop Glen turns out to the yard where a scad of children ranging in age from two to seven are crawling over Hi's car. One is beating on it with a large stick another sits on the hood pulling back one of the windshield wipers etc. As Ed and Dot enter Ed beams as they go to the crib. Dot puts her hand to her forehead reacting to the baby as if she is about to faint hides her face in her hands. and looks away as if blinded then sneaks a look around her hands.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~80%)
test_cases.description: The low wide shot crops the BIKER at his shins with the gas station in the background behind him. The Biker pauses for a moment thinking or feeling CRASH. the bathroom door flies open as the Biker bursts in astride his hog. As Ed and Dot enter Ed beams as they go to the crib. Dot puts her hand to her forehead reacting to the baby as if she is about to faint hides her face in her hands. and looks away as if blinded then sneaks a look around her hands.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The tall narrow view frames the DANCER at her knees, with the coffee shop in the distance behind her. The Dancer lingers for a second, pondering or dreaming. BOOM - the closet door swings open as the Dancer strides in atop her scooter, dim moonlight flooding in with her to cast her into shadowy outline. Beams of moonlight streaming in are highlighted by specks of pollen twirling in the breeze. A rapid zoom in on the jar of peanut butter resting on the mantel below the portrait is captured, followed by a close zoom of her fingers twitching as we hear her sneeze. They are both furiously chomping cookies, glaring at something offscreen. Lee is lounging in the lounge, bottle-feeding Sarah Jr., surrounded by the wrinkled towels and cushions used by the guests. Sam places his fork down and grabs a cigar which has been smoldering in the bowl beside him, with a bead of tea dribbling down his lip. He takes a thoughtful drag, examining Lee through a mouthful of cookies. Sam breathes out vapor and grabs his fork to start back in on his cookies. Jay is strolling in, stretching, clutching the cookies container suspended mid-air, glancing at Lee, who is motioning to Sam and Pat with her gaze. Sam and Pat are glancing vacantly from Lee to Jay, more at ease now, to Lee, gazing imploringly at Jay. Sensing the gaze, he returns to his cookies. Sam reclines back to puff vapor at the fan. Jay, with Lee standing beside, is just unbolting the portal to a fresh duo. Nick is a tiny, slender brunette woman in her early twenties, sporting cargo pants, while LIZ is sporting jeans, boots, and a bonnet over her head. From the rear, Nick gives her a lively WHACK on the calves. Liz twirls and slaps Nick across the head with her backpack through gritted teeth, and she staggers under the impact. Liz yells again, but this time stifles it with her own palm, tiptoeing into the van, hand to her lips. Nick, patting her chin, seems upset with herself. At the peak of the stairs, Nick gazes out to the field, where a gaggle of cats, ranging in size from small to large, are climbing over Jay's bicycle. One is tapping on it with a massive branch, another rests on the handlebars tugging one of the brake levers, etc. As Lee and Liz enter, Lee grins as they approach the crib. Liz presses her hand to her temple, reacting to the kitten as if she is about to swoon, covers her face in her fingers and glances away as if dazzled, then peeks a look through her fingers.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: The biker, partially visible in a low shot, stands pensively near a gas station. Suddenly, he bursts into a bathroom astride his motorcycle, a silhouette highlighted by the daylight. As dust motes dance in the light, he sniffs at a jar of hair jelly. In a living room, Ed bottle-feeds Nathan Jr., amidst rumpled bedding. Gale contemplates Ed while eating cornflakes, blowing smoke, and watching the interactions. Hi enters, clutching a cornflakes box, as Ed signals Gale and Evelle. Tension rises between Ed and Hi, but Gale remains nonchalant. Hi and Ed welcome a young couple, Glen and Dot. Glen, a short stocky man, provokes Dot inadvertently, leading to her retaliating with a purse. Glen seems frustrated as he notices children climbing over Hi's car. Inside, Ed proudly shows Dot the crib, where Dot reacts dramatically to the baby's presence.
